name: Pokemon: The Hodgepodge Platoon
summary: Hodgepodge Platoon is a Pokemon Emerald ROM Hack featuring 80+ usable Fakemon in a facility very similar to the Battle Factory. You'll be faced with brand new moves, abilities, stat spreads, and more, spanning all 9 generations of Pokemon. All of the playable Fakemon are lovingly designed and sprited by over 20 different artists. Hop on in and try to get the biggest streak, and fill out the Pokedex along the way!
